# Dimension Jumper, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Teleportation Spells|teleportation]])

**Level:** [[9th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 9]], [[9th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 9]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 18th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 18]]

**Casting Time:** 1 swift action

**Components:** V

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You and objects touched

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Complete Mage (WotC), pg. 102

*You whisk yourself from place to place with but a thought.*

This spell functions like *[[Dimension Jumper (Spell)|dimension jumper]]**,* except that you teleport as a swift action rather than as a move action, and the range of your teleport extends to 60 feet.
